name: TWCYOA
description:
A choose your own adventure game done for Game Boy in a little over 2 hours.

The game isn't finished as I would have liked, but is any game jam game ever really finished? Also, besides some English errors you'll find the character image is a temporary asset (a weird arrow), I forgot to change it to the silhouette image I did (silly I know). I'll change it afterwards when the jam is over.

Anyway, I wanted to have a bit of fun and make a tiny game and here it is. Please enjoy!
